GSP33ramvaspu:1024_0: iti ca sraṣṭṛtvenāvasthitaṃ brahmaṇaṃ sṛjyaṃ ca saṃhartāraṃ saṃhāryaṃ ca yugapan
GSP33ramvaspu:1024_1: nirdiśya sarvasya viṣṇutādātmyopadeśāt sṛjyasaṃhāryabhūtād vastunaḥ sraṣṭṛsaṃhartror
GSP33ramvaspu:1026: ata eva svecchayā līlārthaṃ vibhūtyantarbhāva ucyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1028: pṛthivyāpas tathā tejo vāyur ākāśa eva ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1032: sa eva sṛjyaḥ sa ca sarvakartā sa eva pātyatti ca pālyate ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1033: brahmādyavasthābhir aśeṣamūrtir viṣṇur variṣṭho varado vareṇyaḥ // iti / (113)
GSP33ramvaspu:1035_1: samastakalyāṇaguṇātmakasya brahmaṇaḥ katham upapadyata ity āśaṅkhya sa eva sarvabhūtātmā
GSP33ramvaspu:1036: sa eva sarveśvaraḥ parabrahmabhūto viṣṇur eva sarvaṃ jagad iti pratijñāya sarvabhūtātmā viśvarūpo yato 'vyaya iti hetur uktaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1037: sarvabhūtānām ayam ātmā viśvaśarīro yato 'vyaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1038: vakṣyati ca satsarvaṃ vai hares tanur iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1040: asyāvyayasyāpi parasya brahmaṇo viṣṇor viśvaśarīratayā tādātmyaviruddham ity ātmaśarīrayoś ca svabhāvā vyavasthitā eva /
GSP33ramvaspu:1041: evaṃbhūtasya sarveśvarasya viṣṇoḥ prapañcāntarbhūtaniyāmyakoṭiniviṣṭabrahmādidevatiryaṅmanuṣyeṣu tat tat samāśrayaṇīyatvāya svecchāvatāraḥ pūrvoktaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1042_0: tad etad brahmādīnāṃ bhāvanātrayānvayena karmavaśyatvaṃ bhagavataḥ parabrahmabhūtasya
GSP33ramvaspu:1042_1: vāsudevasya nikhilajagadupakārāya svecchayā svenaiva rūpeṇa devādiṣv avatāra iti
GSP33ramvaspu:1043: asya devādirūpeṇāvatāreṣv api na prākṛto deha iti mahābhārate na bhūtasaṃghasaṃsthāno deho 'sya paramātmanaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1045: śrutibhiś ca ajāyamāno bahudhā vijāyate tasya dhīrāḥ parijānanti yonim iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1047: ayaṃ tu sarveśvaraḥ satyasaṃkalpo bhagavān evaṃbhūtaśubhetarajanmākurvann api svecchayā svenaiva niratiśayakalyāṇarūpeṇa devādiṣu jagadupakārāya bahudhā jāyate,
GSP33ramvaspu:1048: tasyaitasya śubhetarajanmākurvato 'pi svakalyāṇaguṇānantyena bahudhā yoniṃ bahuvidhajanma dhīrādhīramatām agresarā jānantītyarthaḥ / (114)
GSP33ramvaspu:1050_0: tadetannikhilajagannimittopādānabhūtāj janmādy asya yataḥ prakṛtiś ca pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhādityādisūtraiḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:1050_1: pratipāditāt parasmād brahmaṇaḥ paramapuruṣād anyasya kasyacit parataratvaṃ paramataḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:1050_2: setūn mānasaṃbandhabhedavyapadeśebhya ityāśaṅkya sāmānyāt tu buddhyarthaḥ pādavat
GSP33ramvaspu:1050_3: sthānaviśeṣāt prakāśādivat upapatteś ca tathānyapratiṣedhāt anena sarvagatatvamāyām
GSP33ramvaspu:1050_4: ādiśabdādibhya iti sūtrakāraḥ svayam eva nirākaroti / (115)
GSP33ramvaspu:1054: apa eva sasarjādau tāsu vīryam apāsṛjat //
GSP33ramvaspu:1057: tathā ca sraṣṭuḥ paramapuruṣasya tadvisṛṣṭasya ca brahmaṇaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:1058: ayaṃ tasya tāḥ pūrvaṃ tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1059: tadvisṛṣṭaḥ sa puruṣo loke brahmeti kīrtyate //
GSP33ramvaspu:1061: tathā ca vaiṣṇave purāṇe hiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ bhāvanātrayānvayād aśuddhatvena śubhāśrayatvānarhatopapādanāt kṣetrajñatvaṃ niścīyate / (116)
GSP33ramvaspu:1063: yad api kaiścid uktam sarvasya śabdajātasya vidhyarthavādamantrarūpasya
GSP33ramvaspu:1065: vyavahārād anyatra śabdasya bodhakatvaśaktyavadhāraṇāsaṃbhavād vyavahārasya ca kāryabuddhimūlatvāt kāryarūpa eva śabdārthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1066: na pariniṣpanne vastuni śabdaḥ pramāṇam iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1068: pravartakavākyavyavahāra eva śabdānām arthabodhakatvaśaktyavadhāraṇaṃ kartavyam iti kim iyaṃ rājājñā /
GSP33ramvaspu:1070: tathā hi kenacid dhastaceṣṭādināpavarake daṇḍaḥ sthita iti devadattāya jñāpayeti preṣitaḥ kaścit tajjñāpane pravṛtto 'pavarake daṇḍaḥ sthita iti śabdaṃ prayuṅkte /
GSP33ramvaspu:1071_0: mūkavad dhastaceṣṭām imāṃ jānan pārśvastho 'nyaḥ prāgvyutpanno 'pi tasyārthasya bodhanāyāpavarake
GSP33ramvaspu:1071_1: daṇḍaḥ sthita ityasya śabdasya prayogadarśanād asyārthasyāyaṃ śabdo bodhaka iti jānātīti kim atra duṣkaram /
GSP33ramvaspu:1072_0: tathā bālas tāto 'yam iyaṃ mātāyaṃ mātulo 'yaṃ manuṣyo 'yaṃ mṛgaś candro 'yam ayaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:1072_1: ca sarpa iti mātāpitṛprabhṛtibhiḥ śabdaiḥ śanaiḥ śanair aṅgulyā nirdeśane tatra tatra
GSP33ramvaspu:1072_2: bahuśaḥ śikṣitas tair eva śabdais teṣv artheṣu svātmanaś ca buddhyutpattiṃ dṛṣṭvā
GSP33ramvaspu:1072_3: teṣv artheṣu teṣāṃ śabdānām aṅgulyā nirdeśapūrvakaḥ prayogaḥ sambandhāntarābhāvāt
GSP33ramvaspu:1072_4: saṃketayitṛpuruṣājñānāc ca bodhakatvanibandhana iti krameṇa niścitya punar apy asya
GSP33ramvaspu:1072_5: śabdasyāyam artha iti pūrvavṛddhaiḥ śikṣitaḥ sarvaśabdānām artham avagamya svayam
GSP33ramvaspu:1073: evam eva sarvapadānāṃ svārthābhidhāyitvaṃ saṃghātaviśeṣaṇāṃ ca yathāvasthitasaṃsargaviśeṣavācitvaṃ ca jānātīti kāryārthaiva vyuttipattir ityādinirbandho nirbandhanaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1074: ataḥ pariṣpannaḥ vastuni śabdasyabodhakatvaśaktyavadhāraṇāt sarvāṇi vedāntavākyāni sakalajagatkāraṇaṃ sarvakalyāṇaguṇākaramuktalakṣaṇaṃ brahma bodhayanty eva / (117)
GSP33ramvaspu:1076: api ca kāryārtha eva vyutpattir astu /
GSP33ramvaspu:1077_1: rātrisatrapratiṣṭhānādivad apagoraṇaśatayātanāsādhyasādhanabhāvavac ca karyopayogitayaiva sarvaṃ bodhayanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1078_1: brahmaprāptiḥ śrūyate paraprāptikāmo brahma vidyād ityatra prāpyatayā pratīyamānaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:1078_2: brahmasvarūpaṃ tadviśeṣaṇaṃ ca sarvaṃ kāryopayogitayaiva siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:1079: tadantargatam eva jagatsraṣṭṛtvaṃ saṃhartṛtvam ādhāratvam antarātmatvam ityādy uktam anuktaṃ ca sarvam iti na kiṃcid anupapannam / (118)
GSP33ramvaspu:1081: evaṃ ca sati mantrārthavādagatā hy aviruddhā apūrvāś cārthāḥ sarve vidhiśeṣatayaiva siddhā bhavanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1082: yathoktaṃ dramiḍabhāṣye ṛṇaṃ hi vai jāyata iti śruter ity upakramya yady apy avadānastutiparaṃ vākyaṃ tathāpi nāsatā stutir upapadyata iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1083: etad uktaṃ bhavati sarvo hy arthavādabhāgo devatārādhanabhūtayāgādeḥ sāṅgasyārādhyadevatāyāś cādṛṣṭarūpān guṇān sahasraśo vadan sahasraśaḥ karmaṇi prāśastyabuddhim utpādayati /
GSP33ramvaspu:1084: teṣām asadbhāve prāśastyabuddhir eva na syād iti karmaṇi prāśastyabuddhyarthaṃ guṇasadbhāvam eva bodhayatīti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1085: anayaiva diśā sarve mantrārthavādāvagatā arthāḥ siddhāḥ / (119)
GSP33ramvaspu:1087: api ca kāryavākyārthavādibhiḥ kim idaṃ kāryatvaṃ nāmeti vaktavyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1090: yad adhikṛtya kṛtir vartate tat kṛtyuddeśyatvam iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:1092: yatprāptīcchayā kṛtim utpādayati puruṣaḥ tat kṛtyuddeśyatvam iti ced dhanta tarhīṣṭatvam eva kṛtyuddeśyatvam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1095: tatra prerakatvākāraḥ kṛtyuddeśyatvam iti so 'yaṃ svapakṣābhiniveśakārito vṛthāśramaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1096: tathā hīcchāviṣayatayā pratītasya svaprayatnotpattim antareṇāsiddhir eva prerakatvam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1098: icchāyāṃ jātāyām iṣṭasya svaprayatnotpattim antareṇāsiddhiḥ pratīyate cet tataś cikīrṣā jāyate tataḥ pravartate puruṣa iti tattvavidāṃ prakriyā /
GSP33ramvaspu:1099: tasmād iṣṭasya kṛtyadhīnātmalābhatvātireki kṛtyuddeśyatvaṃ nāma kim pi na dṛṣyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1105: ataḥ sukhavyatiriktasya kasyāpi puruṣānukūlatvaṃ na saṃbhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:1106: nanu ca duḥkhanivṛtter api sukhavyatiriktāyāḥ puruṣānukūlatā dṛṣṭā /
GSP33ramvaspu:1108: ātmānukūlaṃ sukham ātmapratikūlaṃ duḥkham iti hi sukhaduḥkhayor vivekaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1113: tathā hi prakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭasya saṃsāriṇaḥ puruṣasyānukūlasaṃyogaḥ pratikūlasaṃyogaḥ svarūpeṇāvasthitir iti ca tisro 'vasthāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1114: tatra pratikūlasaṃbandhanivṛttiś cānukūlasaṃbandhanivṛttiś ca svarūpeṇāvasthitir eva /
GSP33ramvaspu:1115: tasmāt pratikūlasaṃyoge vartamāne tannivṛttirūpā svarūpeṇāvasthitir apīṣṭā bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:1118: ataḥ sukharūpatvād anukūlatāyāḥ niyogasyānukūlatāṃ vadantaṃ prāmāṇikāḥ parihasanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1119: iṣṭasyārthaviśeṣasya nivartakatayaiva hi niyogasya niyogatvaṃ sthiratvam apūrvatvaṃ ca pratīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1120: svargakāmo yajetety atra kāryasya kriyātiriktā svargakāmapadasamabhivyāhāreṇa svargasādhanatvaniścayād eva bhavanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1121: na ca vācyaṃ yajetety atra prathamaṃ niyogaḥ svapradhānatayaiva pratīyate svargakāmapadasamabhivyāhārāt svasiddhaye svargasiddhyanukūlatā ca niyogasyeti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1123: svargakāmapadasamabhivyāhārād eva dhātvarthātirekiṇo niyogatvaṃ sthiratvam apūrvatvaṃ cetyādi /
GSP33ramvaspu:1125: samabhivyāhṛtasvargakāmapadārthānvayayogyaṃ svargasādhanam eva kāryaṃ liṅādayo 'bhidadhatīti lokavyutpattir api tiraskṛtā /
GSP33ramvaspu:1126: etad uktaṃ bhavati samabhivyahṛtapadāntaravācyārthānvayayogyam evetarapadapratipādyam ityanvitābhidhāyipadasaṃghātarūpavākyaśravaṇasaman antaram eva pratīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1128: ataḥ kriyāvad ananyārthatāpi virodhād eva parityakteti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1129: ata eva gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau ghoṣaprativāsayogyārthopasthāpanaparatvaṃ gaṅgāpadasyāśrīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1130: prathamaṃ gaṅgāpadena gaṅgārthaḥ smṛta iti gaṅgāpadārthasya peyatvaṃ na vākyārthānvayībhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:1131: evam atra api yajetetyetāvanmātraśravaṇe kāryam ananyārthaṃ smṛtam iti vākyārthānvayasamaye kāryasyānanyārthatā nāvatiṣṭhate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1132: kāryābhidhāyipadaśravaṇavelāyāṃ prathamaṃ kāryam ananyārthaṃ pratītam ity etad api na saṃgacchate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1134: ato niyogasya puruṣānukūlatvaṃ sarvalokaviruddhaṃ niyogasya sukharūpapuruṣānukūlatāṃ vadataḥ svānubhavavirodhaś ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1135: karīryā vṛṣṭikāmo yajeytetyādiṣu siddhe 'pi niyoge vṛṣṭyādisiddhinimittasya vṛṣṭivyatirekeṇa niyogasyānukūlatā
GSP33ramvaspu:1137: yady apy asmiñ janmani vṛṣṭyādisiddher aniyamas tathāpy aniyamād eva niyogasiddhir avaśyāśrayaṇīyā /
GSP33ramvaspu:1139: evam uktarītyā kṛtisādhyeṣṭatvātireki kṛtyuddeśyatvaṃ na dṛśyate / (121)
GSP33ramvaspu:1141: kṛtiṃ prati śeṣitvaṃ kṛtyuddeśyatvam iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:1142: kim idaṃ śeṣitvaṃ kiṃ ca śeṣatvam iti vaktavyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1145: evaṃ tarhi kāryatvam eva śeṣitvam ity uktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:1152: kṛtiprayojanatvam iti cet puruṣasya kṛtyārambhaprayojanam eva hi kṛtiprayojanam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1153: sa cecchāviṣayaḥ kṛtyadhīnātmalābha iti pūrvokta eva /
GSP33ramvaspu:1155: paragatātiśayādhānecchopādeyatvam eva yasya svarūpaṃ sa śeṣaḥ paraḥ śeṣī /
GSP33ramvaspu:1156: phalotpattīcchayā yāgādes tatprayatnasya copādeyatvaṃ yāgādisiddhīcchayānyat sarvam upādeyam / (122)
GSP33ramvaspu:1158: evaṃ garbhadāsādīnām api puruṣaviśeṣātiśayādhānopādeyatvam eva svarūpam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1159_1: ca sarvasya vastunaḥ svarūpam iti sarvam īśvaraśeṣatvam eva sarvasya ceśvaraḥ śeṣīti
GSP33ramvaspu:1160: kṛtisādhyaṃ pradhānaṃ yat tatkāryam abhidhīyata ity ayam arthaḥ śraddadhāneṣv eva śobhate / (123)
GSP33ramvaspu:1162: api ca svargakāmo yajetetyādiṣu lakāravācyakartṛviśeṣasamarpaṇaparāṇāṃ svargakāmādipadānāṃ niyojyaviśeṣasamarpaṇaparatvaṃ śabdānuśāsanaviruddhaṃ kenāvagamyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1163: sādhyasvargaviśiṣṭasya svargasādhane kartṛtvānvayo na ghaṭata iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:1164: niyojyatvānvayo 'pi na ghaṭata iti hi svargasādhanatvaniścayaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1165: sa tu śāstrasiddhe kartṛtvānvaye svargasādhanatvaniścayaḥ kriyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1166: yathā bhoktukāmo devadattagṛhaṃ gacched ityukte bhojanakāmasya devadattagṛhagamane kartṛtvaśravaṇād eva prāgajñātam api bhojanasādhanatvaṃ devadattagṛhagamanasyāvagamyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1168: na kriyāntaraṃ prati kartṛtayā śrutasya kriyāntare kartṛtvakalpanaṃ yuktam yajeteti hi yāgakartṛtayā śrutasya biddhau kartṛtvakalpanaṃ kriyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1169: buddheḥ kartṛtvakalpanam eva hi niyojyatvam / yathoktaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:1172: devadattaḥ paced iti pāke kartṛtayā śrutasya devadattasya pākārthagamanaṃ pākānuguṇam iti gamane kartṛtvakalpanaṃ na yujyate / (124)
GSP33ramvaspu:1174: kiṃ ca liṅādiśabdavācyaṃ sthāyirūpaṃ kim ity apūrvam āśrīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1178: tasya svargakāmasya kālāntarabhāvisvargasiddhau kṣaṇabhaṅginī yāgādikriyā na samartheti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:1180: sarvaiḥ karmabhir ārādhitaḥ parameśvaro bhagavān nārāyaṇas tattadiṣṭaṃ phalaṃ dadātīti vedavido vadanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1181: yathāhur vedavidagresarā dramiḍācāryāḥ phalasaṃbibhatsayā hi karmabhir ātmānaṃ piprīṣanti sa prīto 'laṃ phalāyeti śāstramaryādā iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1182: phalasaṃbandhecchayā karmabhir yāgadānahomādibhir indriyādidevatāmukhena tattadantaryāmirūpeṇāvasthitam indrādiśabdavācyaṃ paramātmānaṃ bhagavantaṃ vāsudevam ārirādhayiṣanti,
GSP33ramvaspu:1183: sa hi karmabhir ārādhitas teṣām iṣṭāni phalāni prayacchatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1184: tathā ca śrutiḥ iṣṭāpūrtaṃ bahudhā jātaṃ jāyamānaṃ viśvaṃ bibharti bhuvanasya nābhir iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1186: tadviśvaṃ bibharti indrāgnivaruṇādisarvadevatāsaṃbandhitayā pratīyamānaṃ tattadantarātmatayāvasthitaḥ paramapuruṣaḥ svayam eva bibharti svayam eva svīkaroti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1187: bhuvanasya nābhiḥ brahmakṣatrādisarvavarṇapūrṇasya bhuvanasya dhārakaḥ tais taiḥ karmabhir ārādhitas tattadiṣṭaphalapradānena bhuvanānāṃ dhāraka iti nābhir ityuktaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1188: agnivāyuprabhṛtidevatāntarātmatayā tattacchabdābhidheyo 'yam evety āha tad evāgnis tadvāyus tatsūryas tad u candramā iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1190: yo yo yām yāṃ tanuṃ bhaktaḥ śraddhayārcitum icchati /
GSP33ramvaspu:1191: tasya tasyācalāṃ śraddhāṃ tām eva vidadhāmy aham //
GSP33ramvaspu:1192: sa tasya śraddhayā yuktas tasyārādhanam īhate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1193: labhate ca tataḥ kāmān mayaiva vihitān iha tān // iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1194: yāṃ yāṃ tanum itīndrādidevatāviśeṣās tattadantaryāmitayāvasthitasya bhagavatas tanavaḥ śarīrāṇītyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1195: ahaṃ hi sarvayajñānāṃ bhoktā ca prabhur eva ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1196: ityādi / prabhur eva ceti sarvaphalānāṃ pradātā cetyarthaḥ / yathā ca
GSP33ramvaspu:1198: yaiḥ svadharmaparair nātha narair ādādhito bhavān /
GSP33ramvaspu:1199: te taranty akhilām etāṃ mayām ātmavimuktaye //

GSP33ramvaspu:1417: ato 'gnyādīnāṃ dāhakatvādiśaktivad indriyāṇāṃ bodhakatvaśaktivac ca śabdasyāpi bodhakatvaśaktir āśrayaṇīyā // (138)
GSP33ramvaspu:1419: nanu cen indriyavac chabdasyāpi bodhakatvaṃ svābhāvikaṃ saṃbandhagrahaṇaṃ bodhakatvāya kim ity apekṣate,
GSP33ramvaspu:1420: liṅgādivad iti ucyate yathā jñātasaṃbandhaniyamaṃ dhūmādyagnyādivijñānajanakaṃ tathā jñātasaṃbandhaniyamaḥ śabdo 'py arthaviśeṣabuddhijanakaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1421: evaṃ tarhi śabdo 'py arthaviśeṣasya liṅgam ity anumānaṃ syāt naivam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1422: śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandho bodhyabodhkabhāva eva dhūmādīnāṃ tu saṃbandhāntara iti tasya saṃbandhasya jñānadvāreṇa buddhijanakatvam iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1423: evaṃ gṛhītasaṃbandhasya bodhakatvadarśanād anādyanusaṃdhānāvicchede 'pi saṃketājñānād bodhakatvaśaktir eveti niścīyate / (139)
GSP33ramvaspu:1425: evaṃ bodhakānāṃ padasaṃghātānāṃ saṃsargaviśeṣabodhakatvena vākyaśabdābhidheyānām uccāraṇakramo yatra puruṣabuddhipūrvakas te pauruṣeyāḥ śabdā ity ucyante /
GSP33ramvaspu:1426: yatra tu taduccāraṇakramaḥ pūrvapūrvoccaraṇakramajanitasaṃskārapūrvakaḥ sarvadāpauruṣeyās te ca vedā ity+ucyante /
GSP33ramvaspu:1427: etad eva vedānām apauruṣeyatvaṃ nityatvaṃ ca yatpūrvoccāraṇakramajanitasaṃskāreṇa tam eva kramaviśeṣaṃ smṛtvā tenaiva krameṇoccāryamāṇatvam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1428: te cānupūrvīviśeṣeṇa saṃsthitā akṣararāśayo vedā ṛgyajuḥsāmātharvabhedabhinnā anantaśākhā vartante /
GSP33ramvaspu:1429: te ca vidhyarthavādamantrarūpā vedāḥ parabrahmabhūtanārāyaṇasvarūpaṃ tadārādhanaprakārādhitāt phalaviśeṣaṃ ca bodhayanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1431_0: vedānām anantatvād duravagāhatvāc ca paramapuruṣaniyuktāḥ paramarṣayaḥ kalpe kalpe
GSP33ramvaspu:1431_1: nikhilajagadupakārārthaṃ vedārthaṃ smṛtvā vidhyarthavādamantramūlāni dharmaśāstrāṇītihāsapurāṇāni ca cakruḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1432: laukikāś ca śabdā vedarāśer uddhṛtyaiva tattadarthaviśeṣanāmatayā pūrvavat prayuktāḥ pāraṃparyeṇa prayujyante /
GSP33ramvaspu:1433: nanu ca vaidika eva sarve vācakāḥ śabdāś cec chandasyaivaṃ bhāṣāyām evam iti lakṣaṇabhedaḥ katham upapadyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1434: ucyate teṣām eva śabdānāṃ tasyām evānupūrvyāṃ vartamānāṃ tathaiva prayogaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1435: anyatra prayujyamānānām anyatheti na kaścid doṣaḥ / (140)
GSP33ramvaspu:1438: sarvaṃ khalv idaṃ brahma aitadātmyam idaṃ sarvaṃ tat tvam asi śvetaketo
GSP33ramvaspu:1439: enam eke vadanty agniṃ maruto 'nyo prajāpatim /
GSP33ramvaspu:1440: indram eke pare prāṇam apare brahma śāśvatam //
GSP33ramvaspu:1441: jyotīṃṣi śuklāni ca yāni loke trayo lokā lokapālās trayī ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1442: trayo 'gnayaś cāhutayaś ca pañca sarve deva devakīputra eva //
GSP33ramvaspu:1443: tvaṃ yajñas tvaṃ vaṣaṭkāras tvam oṃkāraḥ paraṃtapaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1444: ṛtudhāmā vasuḥ pūrvo vasūnāṃ tvaṃ prajāpatiḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:1445: jagatsarvaṃ śarīraṃ te sthairyaṃ te vasudhātalam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1446: agniḥ kopaḥ prasādas te somaḥ śrīvatsalakṣaṇaḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:1447: jyotīṃṣi viṣṇur bhuvanāni viṣṇur vanāni viṣṇur girayo diśaś ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1448: nadyaḥ samudrāś ca sa eva sarvaṃ yad asti yan nāsti ca vipravarya //
GSP33ramvaspu:1449: ityādisāmānādhikaraṇyaprayogeṣu sarvaiḥ śabdaiḥ sarvaśarīratayā sarvaprakāraṃ brahmaivābhidhīyata iti coktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1450_0: satyasaṃkalapaṃ paraṃ brahma svayam eva bahuprakāraṃ syām iti saṃkalpyācitsamaṣṭirūpamahābhūtasūkṣmavastu
GSP33ramvaspu:1450_1: bhoktṛvargasamūhaṃ ca svasmin pralīnaṃ svayam eva vibhajya tasmād bhūtasūkṣmād vāstuno
GSP33ramvaspu:1450_2: mahābhūtāni sṛṣṭvā teṣu ca bhoktṛvargātmatayā praveśya taiścid adhiṣṭhitair mahābhūtair
GSP33ramvaspu:1450_3: anyonyasaṃsṛṣṭaiḥ kṛtsnaṃ jagad vidhāya svayam api sarvasyātmatayā praviśya paramātmatvenāvasthitaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:1451: yad idaṃ mahābhūtasūkṣmaṃ vastu tad eva prakṛtiśabdenābhidhīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1455_0: so 'kāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti tatsṛṣṭvā tad evānupraviśat tad anupraviśya sac
GSP33ramvaspu:1455_1: ca tyac cābhavan niruktaṃ cāniruktaṃ ca nilayanaṃ cānilayanaṃ ca vijñānaṃ cāvijñānaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:1455_2: ca satyaṃ cānṛtaṃ ca satyam abhavad iti pūrvoktaṃ sarvam anayaiva śrutyā vyaktam / (141)
GSP33ramvaspu:1461: sukhaṃ ca jñānaviśeṣasādhyaṃ padārthāntaram iti hi laukikāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1463: yena jñānaviśeṣeṇa tatsādhyam ity ucyate sa eva jñānaviśeṣaḥ sukham / (142)
GSP33ramvaspu:1467: yena ca viṣayaviśeṣeṇa viśeṣitaṃ jñānaṃ sukhasya janakam ity abhimataṃ tadviṣayaṃ jñānam eva sukhaṃ,
GSP33ramvaspu:1470: evaṃvidhasukhasvarūpajñānasya viśeṣakatvaṃ brahmavyatiriktasya vastunaḥ sātiśayam asthiraṃ ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1474: tad idam āha raso vai saḥ rasaṃ he evāyaṃ labdhvānandī bhavatīti brahmaiva sukham iti brahma labdhvā sukhī bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1475: paramapuruṣaḥ svenaiva svayam anavadhikātiśayasukhaḥ san parasyāpi sukhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:1477: brahma yasya jñānaviṣayo bhavati sa sukhī bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1482: tathā hi sarveṣām eva cetanānāṃ svātantryam eva iṣṭatamaṃ dṛśyate,
GSP33ramvaspu:1484: sarvaṃ paravaśam duḥkhaṃ sarvam ātmavaśaṃ sukham /
GSP33ramvaspu:1486: sevā śvavṛttir ākhyātā tasmāt tāṃ parivarjayet /
GSP33ramvaspu:1488: tathā hi śarīraṃ hi manuṣyatvādijātiguṇāśrayapiṇḍabhūtaṃ svatantraṃ pratīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1497: ātmā jñānamayo 'mala iti smṛter jñānaikākāratā pratipannā /
GSP33ramvaspu:1498: patiṃ viśvasyetyādi śrutiguṇaiḥ paramātmaśeṣataikākāratā ca pratītā /
GSP33ramvaspu:1501: ata eva teṣām alpatvam asthiratvaṃ ca paramapuruṣasyaiva svata eva sukhatvam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1502: atas tad eva sthiram anavadhikātiśayaṃ ca kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma ānando brahma satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahmeti śruteḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1503: brahmavyatiriktasya kṛtsnasya vastunaḥ svarūpeṇa sukhatvābhāvaḥ karmakṛtatvena cāsthiratvaṃ bhagavatā parāśareṇoktam
GSP33ramvaspu:1505: vastv ekam eva duḥkhāya sukhāyerṣyāgamāya ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1506: kopāya ca yatas tasmād vastu vastvātmakaṃ kutaḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:1509: evam anekapuruṣāpekṣayā kasyacit sukham eva kasyacid duḥkhaṃ bhavatītyavasthāṃ pratipādya,
GSP33ramvaspu:1510: ekasminn api puruṣe na vyavasthitam ityāha
GSP33ramvaspu:1511: tad eva prīyate bhūtvā punarsuḥkhāya jāyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1512: tad eva kopāya yataḥ prasādāya ca jāyate //
GSP33ramvaspu:1513: tasmād duḥkhātmakaṃ nāsti na ca kiṃcit sukhātmakam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1514: iti sukhaduḥkhātmakatvaṃ sarvasya vastunaḥ karmakṛtaṃ na vastusvarūpakṛtam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1517: yat tu sarvaṃ paravaśaṃ duḥkham ityuktaṃ tatparamapuruṣavyatiriktānāṃ parasparaśeṣaśeṣibhāvābhāvāt tadvyatiriktaṃ prati śeṣatā duḥkham evetyuktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1518: sevā śvavṛttir ākhyātety atrāpy asevyasevā śvavṛttir evetyuktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1519: sa hy āśramaiḥ sadopāsyaḥ samastair eka eva tv iti sarvair ātmayāthātmyavedibhiḥ sevyaḥ puruṣottama eka eva /
GSP33ramvaspu:1523: itīyam eva bhaktirūpā sevā brahmavid āpnoti param tam evaṃ vidvān amṛta iha bhavati brahma veda brahmaiva bhavatītyādiṣu vedanaśabdenābhidhīyata ityuktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1524: yam evaiṣa vṛṇute tena labhya iti viśeṣaṇād yam evaiṣa vṛṇuta iti bhavagatā varaṇīyatvaṃ pratīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1526: yasya bhagavaty anavadhikātiśayā prītir jāyate sa eva bhagavataḥ priyatamaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1528: priyo hi jñānino 'tyartham ahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1529: iti / tasmāt parabhaktirūpāpannam eva vedanaṃ tattvato bhagavatprāptisādhanam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1531: na saṃdṛśo tiṣṭhati rūpam asya na cakṣuṣā paśyati kaścanainam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1532: bhaktyā ca dhṛtyā ca samāhitātmā jñānasvarūpaṃ paripaśyatītīha //
GSP33ramvaspu:1533: dhṛtyā samāhitātmā bhaktyā puruṣottamaṃ paśyati sākṣātkaroti prāpnotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1535: bhaktiś ca jñānaviśeṣa eveti sarvam upapannam / (145)
